summary: This bill, the Advancing Quality U.S. Aquaculture Act, amends the National Aquaculture Act of 1980. It extends aquaculture programs, modifies existing sections regarding assessments and reviews, and establishes an Aquaculture Advisory Committee to advise the Secretary on program oversight, technical assistance, and other aspects. The bill also mandates annual reports to Congress on the status of aquaculture and updates the timeline for certain programs.
